mapper.select: select FN109_LIMITE_CREDITO from financeiro..VW09_LIMITE_CREDITO_CLIENTE where ID_CLIENTE = #{id}

select CD18_ID AS clienteId, CD18_CIC_CGC as cnpj, VD25_STATUS AS STATUS_SEFAZ from CADASTRO..CD18_CLIENTE WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN VENDAS.DBO.VD25_CONTRIBUINTE_SEFAZ (NOLOCK) ON (VD25_CNPJ = CONVERT(NUMERIC, CD18_CIC_CGC)) and CD18_ID_ESTADO = 10 and CD18_CONTRIBUINTE = 1 where CD18_ID = #{id}
